text:
Wacław Józef Swierzawski (14 May 1927 – 7 October 2017) was a Polish Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1949, Swierzawski served as bishop of the Diocese of Sandomierz, Poland, from 1992 to 2002.
Swierzawski died on 7 October 2017 in Zawichost, Poland at the age of 90.
